languages.text: {n}Обведя взглядом бывших собратьев, Паскаль сухо шепчет:{/n} "Ноосферная сигнатура дефектных единиц добавлена в архив. Согласно заповеди "Не терпи ереси" выношу приговор — категорическая утилизация без права на покаяние".

{n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."
languages.original_text: {n}Обведя взглядом бывших собратьев, Паскаль сухо шепчет:{/n} "Ноосферная сигнатура дефектных единиц добавлена в архив. Согласно заповеди "Не терпи ереси" выношу приговор — категорическая утилизация без права на покаяние".

languages.text: {n}パスカルはかつての仲間を見つめ、乾いた声でつぶやく。{/n}「欠陥ユニットのヌースフィア信号をアーカイブした。神聖な戒律に従い、自分はいかなる異端も容認せず、あなたに贖罪なき処分を宣告する」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはかつての仲間を見つめ、乾いた声でつぶやく。{/n}「欠陥ユニットのヌースフィア信号をアーカイブした。神聖な戒律に従い、自分はいかなる異端も容認せず、あなたに贖罪なき処分を宣告する」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal observe ses anciens frères et murmure sèchement :{/n} « La signature noosphérique des unités défectueuses a été archivée. Conformément aux commandements sacrés, je ne tolère aucune hérésie et vous condamne par la présente à une élimination catégorique sans rédemption. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal observe ses anciens frères et murmure sèchement :{/n} « La signature noosphérique des unités défectueuses a été archivée. Conformément aux commandements sacrés, je ne tolère aucune hérésie et vous condamne par la présente à une élimination catégorique sans rédemption. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着昔日的战友，以干巴巴的语气开了口。{/n}“缺陷单位的通感签名已存档。根据神圣戒律规定，我绝不容忍任何异端邪说。我在此宣判，你们将会受到即刻处置，不容宽恕。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡凝视着昔日的战友，以干巴巴的语气开了口。{/n}“缺陷单位的通感签名已存档。根据神圣戒律规定，我绝不容忍任何异端邪说。我在此宣判，你们将会受到即刻处置，不容宽恕。”

languages.text: {n}Pasqal mira a sus antiguos hermanos y susurra secamente:{/n} «Se ha registrado la firma noosférica de las unidades defectuosas. De acuerdo con los sagrados mandamientos, no toleraré ninguna herejía y, por la presente, las sentencio a ser eliminadas categóricamente sin posibilidad de redención».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal mira a sus antiguos hermanos y susurra secamente:{/n} «Se ha registrado la firma noosférica de las unidades defectuosas. De acuerdo con los sagrados mandamientos, no toleraré ninguna herejía y, por la presente, las sentencio a ser eliminadas categóricamente sin posibilidad de redención».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt seine ehemaligen Brüder an und flüstert trocken:{/n} "Die Noosphären-Signatur der defekten Einheiten wurde archiviert. Gemäß den heiligen Geboten werde ich keinerlei Ketzerei dulden und verurteile Euch hiermit zur kategorischen Entsorgung ohne Möglichkeit der Buße."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt seine ehemaligen Brüder an und flüstert trocken:{/n} "Die Noosphären-Signatur der defekten Einheiten wurde archiviert. Gemäß den heiligen Geboten werde ich keinerlei Ketzerei dulden und verurteile Euch hiermit zur kategorischen Entsorgung ohne Möglichkeit der Buße."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, eski kardeşlerine bakıp kuru kuru fısıldıyor.{/n} "Arızalı birimlerin Noosfer imzası arşivlendi. Kutsal emirlerin gerektirdiği üzere kâfirliğe müsamaha göstermeyeceğim. Bu vesileyle sizi kefaretsiz kategorik imhaya mahkûm ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal gazes at his former brethren and whispers dryly,{/n} "The Noosphere signature of the defective units has been archived. In accordance with the sacred commandments, I will tolerate no heresy and hereby sentence you to categorical disposal without redemption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, eski kardeşlerine bakıp kuru bir şekilde fısıldıyor.{/n} "Arızalı birimlerin Noosfer imzası arşivlendi. Kutsal emirlerin gerektirdiği üzere kâfirliğe müsamaha göstermeyeceğim. Bu vesileyle sizi tövbesiz kategorik imhaya mahkûm ediyorum."
